Scientific goal . To determine whether aripiprazole prevents relapse cocaine use effectively placebo cocaine-abstinent patient maintain methadone . Participant population . A total 275 opioid-dependent outpatient abuse cocaine opioids ( 110 evaluable ) enrol . Target enrollment include 40 % woman 60 % minority ( mostly African-American ) . Experimental design method . The study randomize double-blind clinical trial two treatment group ( 55 per group ) : aripiprazole ( 15 mg oral daily ) placebo . All patient receive standard treatment ( methadone daily individual counseling weekly ) 39 week . To establish abstinence prior aripiprazole induction , contingent voucher give cocaine-negative urine specimen first 12 week ( week 1-12 ) . From week 28-33 , participant receive methadone counseling , offer assistance transfer another program ; transfer undergo 8-week methadone detoxification . The primary outcome measure time relapse long duration cocaine abstinence .
